dataModel.title: title of the HTML document
dataModel.author: author of the HTML document
dataModel.institution: institute at which the author resides

entity.entityDescription: description of the table - more lengthy than the summary

attribute.attType: type of the attribute (VARCHAR, INT etc..)
attribute.attReferences: if the attribute is a foreign key what table does it reference

attribute.attType: type of the attribute (VARCHAR, INT etc..)
attribute.attReferences: if the attribute is a foreign key what table does it reference

entity.children: what are the child tables of this table
